document.full_text: two second-half goals by lionel messi gave barcelona a 2-0 victory at real madrid to take control of their heated champions league semifinal.
document.title: barcelona 2, real madrid 0: messi gives barcelona a win over madrid
lines_and_colors: two second-half goals by lionel messi gave barcelona a 2-0 victory at real madrid to take control of their heated champions league semifinal.
